Articles.Content: this challenge is simple: build a balloon based spacecraft (using HoolganLabs's Airship Mod) that can get into space from eve's sea level. It must carry at least 4 kerbals (hitchhiker is suggested). all mods excepted.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guidelines

this challenge is simple: build a balloon based spacecraft (using HoolganLabs's Airship Mod) that can get into space from eve's sea level. It must carry at least 4 kerbals (hitchhiker is suggested). all mods excepted.

So basically I can build a ship that has any part from HooliganLabs's Airship Mod and some insane ISP engine (that would take me a minute to make) to get me up from sea level? No challenge.

Maybe believable mods only. No tanks that hold 500K fuel and weight 0.0001 for example. Also, no magical fuel generation.

Just some ideas.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guidelines

So basically I can build a ship that has any part from HooliganLabs's Airship Mod and some insane ISP engine (that would take me a minute to make) to get me up from sea level? No challenge.

He said excepted, not accepted.
uh... I realized this is kind of a stupid challenge. you probably shouldn't bother.
